name: Amazing Bubble Pet Go Adventure - Pop And Rescue Puzzle Shooter Games
name_original: Amazing Bubble Pet Go Adventure - Pop And Rescue Puzzle Shooter Games
description:
Download the FUN and AMAZING MATCH 3 Bubble game FOR FREE!

Pet Bubble Shooter Deluxe is a fun bubble shooter game. Cute Pet Rescue shoot bubbles to pop and drop the way to victory. It’s so fun and addictive to collect beautiful and gather energy for cannon bubble!

AWESOME AND ADDICTIVE PUZZLES!

Pop three or more bubbles to gain points. Collect all before you run out of moves! Aim, shoot bubbles and match colors to crush your way to victory! Unlock these exciting and challenging levels. The levels seem easy, come and win 3 stars. Use shooting line and boosters to get a higher score.

Exciting Features
- Match three or more cute and lovely bubbles to complete level!
- Match as much as you can before you run out of move!
- Easy to play, but challenge to master!
- Unlock different powerful items and boosters to help you get a HIGH SCORE!
- 240 magical levels and challenges for endless FUN!
- High-quality graphics and crystal clear sound effects!
- Regular updates will bring more challenging levels!

Just play it, and become the best bubble shooter.
